openBIS application has been created by SIS section.

To create a new account send an e-mail to bbbhub@bioinformatics.unibe.ch containing your full name (first to last), title (if applicable) and your affiliation (if not applicable, state it).
In the subject of the e-mail write "BBBHub - New account"

In case you have any questions or you are experiencing a problem with the login send an e-mail to bbbhub@bioinformatics.unibe.ch with a description of the problem/your doubt.
In the e-mail subject write "BBBHub - Help"
